name: Hatmantha's Apothecary (LD 49)
description:
Play as Hatmantha, an enchanted witches hat as she tries her best to sort out potion ingredients for her creator!

Updated to Version 1.1:
- Flipped one boolean that was causing only green and red ingredients to spawn after 10 crates.
- Fixed a bug where the game scaled too fast because math
- Fixed an issue that was causing the ingredient spawning to bypass spawning needed ingredients, instead favoring true randomness (unintended)
- Fixed an issue that was causing the audio track to speed up too fast (would rather have made new tracks, but that would be too big of a change post-jam)
